label: 雑役免
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Exemption from all levies (labor or tribute) except the regular land tax (nengu). This did not necessarily benefit the local peasantry: it simply meant that myōshu or estate officers did not have to pass on to higher authorities what had been requisitioned or collected from below.　[年貢、名主]
